input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to add an extra email address on linkedin?
input_text.Response A: Sure, I can help you with that. You’ll need to go to the account settings page and click on the “Personal Email” tab.  Then you’ll need to click on the “Add Email Address” button, and enter your new email address.  Once you’ve done that, you can click on the “Save” button to save your changes.
input_text.Response B: Sure, I can help you with that!  To add a new email address to your LinkedIn account, you will first need to sign in to your account.  Then, you will click on the “profile” tab at the top of the page, and then click on the “settings” tab.  Next, you will click on the “email settings” tab, and then click on the “add email” button.  You will then be able to add a new email address to your account.  You can also change your primary email address by clicking on the “primary email” tab, and then clicking on the “edit primary email” button.  I hope this helps!
